level.heading: Quarterly report on status of Medicaid eligibility.
level.text: Beginning February 1, 2012, the Department shall issue quarterly reports on the status of the Money Follows the Person program. The report shall include the following:
The number of applications submitted for Medicaid;
The number of applications approved for Medicaid; and
The amount of money obtained from Medicaid.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 19-171 substituted "the Department shall" for "DYRS shall".

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 19-171, see notes under ยง 2-218.13.
